item.title: The History of Bad Ideas: Meritocracy
item.description: Today’s bad idea is one that started out as satire and ended as a political slogan. David talks to historian of ideas Ben Jackson about meritocracy and its origins in Michael Young’s book The Rise of the Meritocracy published in 1958. Young foresaw a populist revolt against the meritocratic elite in the year 2034... Feed: https://feeds.megaphone.fm/ARML2708405200
